resources.string: TV Interface - User can turn on / off the TV. User can change channels either by buttons or by entering the channel number or by using the entry pad. User can also change the volume using the entry pad.
Lamp 1 Interface - User can turn on / off the lamp.
Lamp 2 Interface - User can turn on / off the lamp. User can change the brightness of a lamp.
Lamp 3 Interface - User can turn on / off the lamp. User can change the brightness of a lamp. User can change color of a lamp.
Blinds Interface - User can open or close blinds using a slider.

Use the On/Off button to turn the TV ON or OFF
 Use the PADs Left and Right buttons to change volume
 Use the PADs Up and Down to change channels
 Use the enter button to play the selected channel.
 Use can also enter a channel to add it to the channels list.
Use the ON/OFF button to turn the lamp ON or OFF.
Use the ON/OFF button to turn the lamp ON or OFF\n Use the Seek Bar to change the lamps dimming level.
Use the ON/OFF button to turn the lamp ON or OFF\n Use the Seek Bar to change the lamps dimming level\n Use the Spinner to change the lamps color.
Use the slider to open or close the blinds.
